_meta.validation_status: estimated — validate against eurocircuits.com PCB Calculator
_meta.note: Estimate based on published rates as of 2026-02 — verify at eurocircuits.com
pricing_notes: Eurocircuits uses an order-pooling model — multiple customers share large manufacturing panels.
Pricing is area-based (dm² = 100cm²). Larger boards use more panel area and cost proportionally more.
No tooling charges. No setup fees. No minimum order charge.
Pool PCB standard lead time: 7 working days for orders <50 dm².
Assembly available: SMT + THT. 481,000+ verified components in their parts database.
No confirmed public API (as of 2026-02). Rate card model used permanently until direct contact confirms otherwise.
All prices in EUR. Convert to GBP at runtime using Redis fx:EUR_GBP key.
Upgrade path: if API access is confirmed, update this file method to 'api_live' and build the adapter.
_meta.api_status: none — no confirmed public partner API
_meta.api_notes: Direct contact initiated (see ENHANCEMENTS.md). Eurocircuits 2026 roadmap mentions 'expanded API-based integration' but this refers to internal workflow automation, not a customer/partner API.

assembly_notes: SMT and THT assembly. 481,000+ component database. Lead times: 3, 5, 7, or 10 working days. Max 5,000 components per order.

lead_times.pool_notes: 7 working days for orders <50 dm² total panel area. Larger orders take 10-15 working days.

hal_leadfree.label: Lead-Free HAL (Hot Air Levelling, RoHS)
hal_leadfree.notes: Default and most economical. Uneven surface — not ideal for fine-pitch (<0.5mm) components.

enig.label: ENIG (Electroless Nickel Immersion Gold, RoHS)
enig.notes: 18% surcharge on board cost. Flat surface — required for fine-pitch components. Premium quality.

immersion_silver.label: Immersion Silver (ImAg, RoHS)
immersion_silver.notes: 10% surcharge. Flat surface. Tarnish risk if not stored correctly.

area_pricing.notes: Eurocircuits prices by area. 1 dm² = 100 cm². Area = (w_mm / 100) * (h_mm / 100) dm². For pooling, the cost per dm² decreases slightly with larger panel utilisation, but for our reference boards this is approximated as linear.

price_table.ref_spec: 2-layer STANDARD Pool, Lead-Free HAL, 1oz copper, 1.6mm FR4, 7 working day lead time, EUR
price_table.interpolation_notes: Scale prices by board area in dm² relative to reference entries. 50x50mm = 0.25 dm², 100x100mm = 1.0 dm², 160x100mm = 1.6 dm². For intermediate sizes, interpolate between the two nearest entries by area.
